ComicInfo.Summary:
The supernatural PI business isn’t what it used to be and the money hasn’t been flowing in the way Robyn had hoped. At this point she’ll take whatever she can get including a run of the mill, cheating husband case that happens to walk through her door. But this case is far from ordinary and it will take the help of an unexpected ally for Robyn to solve it without losing her life.
*List of covers and their creators:* | Cover | Name | Creator(s) | Sidebar Location | |-------|--------------------------------------------------------------|------------------------------------------|------------------| | A | Cover A | Paolo Pantalena & Arif Prianto | 1 | | B | Cover B | Michele Bandini & Walter Pereyra | 2 | | C | Cover C | Renato Rei & Wes Hartman | 3 | | D | Cover D | David Lorenzo Riveiro & Ulises Grostieta | 4 | | E | Wizard World Chicago Exclusive Variant Cover, Limited to 500 | Paul Green & Ula Mos | Missing | | F | VIP Exclusive Variant Cover, Limited to 350 | Paul Green & Ula Mos | Missing |
Note: The digital edition (8/10/2016) for this issue was released before the print edition.
